short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts you if you are on facebook to remind you if you are wasting time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This a productivity extension so that when someone opens Facebook it reminds them that because of it's engaging content, a bunch of time could potentially been spent by visiting the site.
